title: Paragons Pulse 12
content:encoded:
Through Paragons Pulse, we curate insights and intel from ParagonsDAO, the games/protocols weâ€™re involved in, andÂ beyond!

In this issue, readÂ about:

  • ğŸŒğŸŸï¸ New partnerships
  • ğŸ«‚New contributors andÂ councils
  • âš¡ï¸Parallel early access, PRIME sinks, EchelonÂ news

And more!

ParagonsDAO updates

ğŸŒğŸŸï¸Partnerships

We released a proposal to partner with @ThePriming. Learn more on our discussion forumâ€¦

ParagonsDAO on Twitter: "ğŸŒâš¡ï¸The Priming. Ever heard of it?ğŸ“„We've just released a proposal outlining potential partnership with @ThePriming - one of the most important community tools in the @ParallelTCG ecosystem with sights set beyond! ğŸ’¬Community AMA coming soonhttps://t.co/2uKWkKCtSq / Twitter"

ğŸŒâš¡ï¸The Priming. Ever heard of it?ğŸ“„We've just released a proposal outlining potential partnership with @ThePriming - one of the most important community tools in the @ParallelTCG ecosystem with sights set beyond! ğŸ’¬Community AMA coming soonhttps://t.co/2uKWkKCtSq

â€¦and join our community AMA tomorrow in our Discord to discuss more and ask questions!

We formalized our partnership with @BLVKHVND & @ProjectStadium

ParagonsDAO on Twitter: "We're ecstatic for our future with @BLVKHVND/@ProjectStadium! The Paragons Council has voted in the next stage our long-term alignment through voting in PDIP 11.Read about it in this article, or continue in this thread for a short summary ğŸ‘‡ğŸ§µ1/9https://t.co/mBgDsehLetï¿¼ pic.twitter.com/qPIn90agSr / Twitter"

We're ecstatic for our future with @BLVKHVND/@ProjectStadium! The Paragons Council has voted in the next stage our long-term alignment through voting in PDIP 11.Read about it in this article, or continue in this thread for a short summary ğŸ‘‡ğŸ§µ1/9https://t.co/mBgDsehLetï¿¼ pic.twitter.com/qPIn90agSr

â€¦and @BLVKHVND has proposed the next stage of their DAO evolution toward a truly decentralized esportsÂ org

BLVKHVND ğŸŒœâ˜ ï¸ğŸŒ› on Twitter: "Today, we submitted a proposal to @nounsbuilder to evolve BLVKHVND into an esports org that can truly be owned by everyone. https://t.co/QjWIQgKOL3Here's why ğŸ§µ / Twitter"

Today, we submitted a proposal to @nounsbuilder to evolve BLVKHVND into an esports org that can truly be owned by everyone. https://t.co/QjWIQgKOL3Here's why ğŸ§µ

ğŸ«‚People

We launched elections for our Paragons Council and Treasury Council. The polls close today at 11:59 pm UTC so if you havenâ€™t voted yet, do itÂ now!

ParagonsDAO on Twitter: "ğŸ—³ï¸ Voting for Epoch 3 Elections is now open$PDT holders and stakers can vote for our next Paragons and Treasury Councils by Dec 20 at 11:59 pm UTCğŸ”Review nominees, the process and next steps here https://t.co/1A1Tz1aZsF / Twitter"

ğŸ—³ï¸ Voting for Epoch 3 Elections is now open$PDT holders and stakers can vote for our next Paragons and Treasury Councils by Dec 20 at 11:59 pm UTCğŸ”Review nominees, the process and next steps here https://t.co/1A1Tz1aZsF

We welcomed a new Lead Finance Contributor and Community Manager to ourÂ team

ParagonsDAO on Twitter: "We're pumped to welcome @0xMilamber and @Pricardodrak to our FT contributor team, starting today! Two amazing examples of how we're leveraging the talent, passion and momentum within our community as we prepare for a huge 2023ğŸ‘‡ğŸ§µ1/3 / Twitter"

We're pumped to welcome @0xMilamber and @Pricardodrak to our FT contributor team, starting today! Two amazing examples of how we're leveraging the talent, passion and momentum within our community as we prepare for a huge 2023ğŸ‘‡ğŸ§µ1/3

Other updates

ğŸª™We published our Treasury Ethos outlining our responsible treasury strategy with a focus onÂ building

ParagonsDAO on Twitter: "ğŸª™Our treasury is resilient through rough market conditions. Why?âš–ï¸Check out our Treasury Ethos-the guiding principles that help us responsibly manage our finances so we can focus on BUILDING!https://t.co/NKoczfDbrE / Twitter"

ğŸª™Our treasury is resilient through rough market conditions. Why?âš–ï¸Check out our Treasury Ethos-the guiding principles that help us responsibly manage our finances so we can focus on BUILDING!https://t.co/NKoczfDbrE

ğŸ‘•We had an awesome, fun chat with with @orphan_crypto and @heyhaigh, where we learned about @RAGS_Y3K and discussed all things Streetwear/Crypto/Tech/Insane Clown Posse ğŸ”¥ğŸ’£. Check out the recording here.

Game updates

âš¡ï¸Parallel andÂ Echelon

@ParallelTCG Pack Drop has been announced for January 14, 2023! This rounds out the Parallel Alpha collection in preparation forâ€¦.

Parallel on Twitter: "ğ—£ğ—®ğ—°ğ—¸ ğ——ğ—¿ğ—¼ğ—½ ğŸ²January 14th, 2023 pic.twitter.com/P9eRiWvAHq / Twitter"

ğ—£ğ—®ğ—°ğ—¸ ğ——ğ—¿ğ—¼ğ—½ ğŸ²January 14th, 2023 pic.twitter.com/P9eRiWvAHq

â€¦their closed Alpha release in February. Parallel announced the Early Access program, which sounds like itâ€™ll be open to about 2k players. If you havenâ€™t signed up, go for it! They want all types of players, so answer the survey honestly.

Parallel on Twitter: "ğ—£ğ—®ğ—¿ğ—®ğ—¹ğ—¹ğ—²ğ—¹'ğ˜€ ğ—˜ğ—®ğ—¿ğ—¹ğ˜† ğ—”ğ—°ğ—°ğ—²ğ˜€ğ˜€ ğ—£ğ—¿ğ—¼ğ—´ğ—¿ğ—®ğ—ºğ—•ğ—²ğ—´ğ—¶ğ—»ğ˜€ ğ—™ğ—²ğ—¯ ğŸ®ğŸ¬ğŸ®ğŸ¯Registration for Parallel's Early Access Program is now open. Head to https://t.co/Zlb9x5DZAQ to sign up and get prepared for play testing // pic.twitter.com/xXWkegEwGv / Twitter"

ğ—£ğ—®ğ—¿ğ—®ğ—¹ğ—¹ğ—²ğ—¹'ğ˜€ ğ—˜ğ—®ğ—¿ğ—¹ğ˜† ğ—”ğ—°ğ—°ğ—²ğ˜€ğ˜€ ğ—£ğ—¿ğ—¼ğ—´ğ—¿ğ—®ğ—ºğ—•ğ—²ğ—´ğ—¶ğ—»ğ˜€ ğ—™ğ—²ğ—¯ ğŸ®ğŸ¬ğŸ®ğŸ¯Registration for Parallel's Early Access Program is now open. Head to https://t.co/Zlb9x5DZAQ to sign up and get prepared for play testing // pic.twitter.com/xXWkegEwGv

Catch the recording of their Early Access Twitter SpacesÂ here

Theyâ€™ve also released the first two PRIME sinks ğŸš°â€Šâ€”â€Šboth have shown incredible potential for PRIME velocityÂ already!

//Kalos on Twitter: "ğ—£ğ—²ğ—¿ğ—°ğ—²ğ—»ğ˜ ğ—¼ğ—³ ğ—–ğ—¹ğ—®ğ—¶ğ—ºğ—²ğ—± ğ—£ğ—¥ğ—œğ— ğ—˜ ğ—¦ğ˜‚ğ—»ğ—¸:ğŸ³.ğŸ®ğŸ²%Total PRIME Claimed:6,925,848.32Payload PRIME Sunk:213,045.00Artigraph PRIME Sunk:290,100.00Total PRIME Sunk:503,145.00 / Twitter"

ğ—£ğ—²ğ—¿ğ—°ğ—²ğ—»ğ˜ ğ—¼ğ—³ ğ—–ğ—¹ğ—®ğ—¶ğ—ºğ—²ğ—± ğ—£ğ—¥ğ—œğ— ğ—˜ ğ—¦ğ˜‚ğ—»ğ—¸:ğŸ³.ğŸ®ğŸ²%Total PRIME Claimed:6,925,848.32Payload PRIME Sunk:213,045.00Artigraph PRIME Sunk:290,100.00Total PRIME Sunk:503,145.00

ğŸš° 1â€Šâ€”â€ŠArtigraphs allow holders to exchange PRIME for a limited edition card signed by theÂ artist.

Parallel on Twitter: "ğ—”ğ—¿ğ˜ğ—¶ğ—´ğ—¿ğ—®ğ—½ğ—µAvailable as an exclusive and limited upgrade, you may now have your favorite Parallel card digitally signed by the artist that designed it. Submit PRIME tokens + your card to receive an Artigraph of that card.https://t.co/hLwpAlYaJn pic.twitter.com/Xs9rglpPM8 / Twitter"

ğ—”ğ—¿ğ˜ğ—¶ğ—´ğ—¿ğ—®ğ—½ğ—µAvailable as an exclusive and limited upgrade, you may now have your favorite Parallel card digitally signed by the artist that designed it. Submit PRIME tokens + your card to receive an Artigraph of that card.https://t.co/hLwpAlYaJn pic.twitter.com/Xs9rglpPM8

ğŸš° 2â€Šâ€”â€ŠPayload allows players to collect cards to round out their decks for 1 PRIME each, with a focus on common/uncommons.

Parallel on Twitter: "ğ—£ğ—®ğ˜†ğ—¹ğ—¼ğ—®ğ—±Swap 1 Prime for 1 card. What you get is random and can be anything from a First Edition Common to a Prime rarity Asset. This gives players a chance to fill out their decks with NFTs for a low Prime cost, or possibly pull something more.https://t.co/u5ZxjEAhQZ pic.twitter.com/nhI700Dpmf / Twitter"

ğ—£ğ—®ğ˜†ğ—¹ğ—¼ğ—®ğ—±Swap 1 Prime for 1 card. What you get is random and can be anything from a First Edition Common to a Prime rarity Asset. This gives players a chance to fill out their decks with NFTs for a low Prime cost, or possibly pull something more.https://t.co/u5ZxjEAhQZ pic.twitter.com/nhI700Dpmf

And judging by this graph, youâ€™re going to have FOMO if youâ€™re not playing with a full deck of NFTÂ cards.

If you donâ€™t have a full deck, or want to borrow better cardsâ€¦just borrow from us, forÂ free

How weâ€™ll share our Web3 game assets using Reputation as Credit

Echelon has been tirelessly engaging the community for feedback on several topics, including Emissary Prime elections, the Ardent Prime program, and timeline for the unlock of the PRIMEÂ token.

Their latest bulletin:

Echelon on Twitter: "Bulletin 22.02 V2 - revised to account for community feedback.https://t.co/fSHgt6PZgfJoin us Thursday, December 22 at 1pm EST for a community call to discuss. Click '1 Event' at the top of the sidebar on Discord and hit 'Interested' for a notification when we go live. / Twitter"

Bulletin 22.02 V2 - revised to account for community feedback.https://t.co/fSHgt6PZgfJoin us Thursday, December 22 at 1pm EST for a community call to discuss. Click '1 Event' at the top of the sidebar on Discord and hit 'Interested' for a notification when we go live.

The unlock of PRIME has a significant impact on us and our community.

Our councils are evaluating the options theyâ€™ve laid out in the linked forum post. Our official vote may be influenced by how liquidity will be managed, and the role we canÂ play.

PRIME Unlock Options

ğŸ›¡ï¸ARBO

ï¸@meetARBOâ€™s Basic Combat Training opened earlier this monthâ€Šâ€”â€Ša unique way that you can help co-create and test the gameâ€™s mechanics while competing for prizes in a $100k prizeÂ pool!

ARBO on Twitter: "Basic Combat Training is live! https://t.co/SAAIO8KfJhContribute to game balancing and testing to win from our massive prize pool! Details in our Discord: https://t.co/igbMNOKgN5#Play2Earn #Web3 #NFTs #gaming / Twitter"

Basic Combat Training is live! https://t.co/SAAIO8KfJhContribute to game balancing and testing to win from our massive prize pool! Details in our Discord: https://t.co/igbMNOKgN5#Play2Earn #Web3 #NFTs #gaming

ï¸There are already over 60 strategies postedâ€Šâ€”â€Šthatâ€™s over 180 heroes and 900 protocols. Weâ€™ve submitted 3 soÂ far!

A snapshot will be taken of all posted Strategies today at 12pm ESTâ€Šâ€”â€Šthe team will airdrop a free protocol to allÂ stakers.

ARBO on Twitter: "900 @meetARBO Protocol cards (#SFT) and 180 Heroes (#NFT) have been staked for Basic Combat Training to date.Players mine prizes by being drawn into & winning internal test games played by devs. Snapshot of all staked Strategies for a free unreleased Protocol to be announced. pic.twitter.com/QV0TsvAYaU / Twitter"

900 @meetARBO Protocol cards (#SFT) and 180 Heroes (#NFT) have been staked for Basic Combat Training to date.Players mine prizes by being drawn into & winning internal test games played by devs. Snapshot of all staked Strategies for a free unreleased Protocol to be announced. pic.twitter.com/QV0TsvAYaU

ARBO also releasing a free NFT mint tomorrow, December 21, for previously unreleased protocols you can use to build out your strategies.

ARBO on Twitter: "ğŸ‘ï¸ Bootcamp FanFaucet will go live December 21st. Claim one free Protocol wallet/account. pic.twitter.com/cQKDMQirZ4 / Twitter"

ğŸ‘ï¸ Bootcamp FanFaucet will go live December 21st. Claim one free Protocol wallet/account. pic.twitter.com/cQKDMQirZ4

ğŸ‘ï¸The Watch

The game once known as â€œFrontierâ€ is now â€œThe Watchâ€ following a rebranding.

Check out their latest Sprint Sync, where they outline their progress towards their MVP (pre-Alpha release), for select collectorsâ€¦theyâ€™re gettingÂ close!

THE WATCH on Twitter: "ğ—¡ğ—²ğ˜„ ğ—¦ğ—½ğ—¿ğ—¶ğ—»ğ˜ ğ—¦ğ˜†ğ—»ğ—°We are now getting close to Pre-Alpha for a selection of Stellar Members. âœš Read now at https://t.co/f4cKb6ovKa pic.twitter.com/MQgVFDWPcW / Twitter"

ğ—¡ğ—²ğ˜„ ğ—¦ğ—½ğ—¿ğ—¶ğ—»ğ˜ ğ—¦ğ˜†ğ—»ğ—°We are now getting close to Pre-Alpha for a selection of Stellar Members. âœš Read now at https://t.co/f4cKb6ovKa pic.twitter.com/MQgVFDWPcW

ğŸ’—Our ProjectÂ Pulse

In the past few weeks weâ€™ve had new partnerships. New hires. An election. A treasury philosophy. And big news in the games weâ€™re involved inâ€Šâ€”â€Šall while we continue to build. Much more to come inÂ 2023!

Happy Holidays all and thanks for reading! If you enjoyed this update, make sure to subscribe to our Medium to get notified when the next edition comes out (and give it a clap or two while youâ€™re atÂ it)!

Follow us on Twitter and join ourÂ Discord.

Trade PDT, ParagonsDAOâ€™s token, through Uniswap (or use Cowswap to prevent frontrunning). PDTâ€™s contract address is 0x375abb85c329753b1ba849a601438ae77eec9893.

Check out PDT on CoinGecko.

Paragons Pulse 12 was originally published in ParagonsDAO on Medium, where people are continuing the conversation by highlighting and responding to this story.
